Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Jefferson Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Jefferson Park. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Orleans
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Orleans, Chicago Ave, LaSalle and Division due to, street blockage near Division/Orleans.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Orleans, Chicago Ave, LaSalle and Division due to, street blockage near Division/Orleans.

Allow extra travel time.
